$schema.description: Links to the JSON schema (the thing generating these descriptions), don't change this!

discordClientId.description: Client ID of the Discord bot.

discordClientSecret.description: Client secret of the Discord bot.

maxQueueSize.description: Maximum number of items allowed in a queue, set to 0 for no limit.

statusTimePeriod.description: Time (in seconds) between bot status/activity updates. Setting to 0 disables updates entirely.

levenshteinThreshold.description:
Minimum string similarity of search result and queried search.
Results below this number won't be recognized.
User to prevent unintentionally queueing random videos.

volumeModifier.description: Volume on all tracks is multiplied by this amount.

embedColour.description: Colour of embeds, in HEX format.

timeoutThresholds.description:
These values dictate maximum time allowed for certain tasks.
Setting to 0 will give unlimited time (unless specified otherwise).
Values are all in seconds.

discordLogin.description: Maximum time allowed for logging into Discord.

fetchResults.description: Maximum time allowed for fetching search results.

generateResource.description: Maximum time allowed for preparing audio streams.

connect.description: Maximum time allowed for connecting to a voice channel.

play.description: Maximum time allowed to start playing a track.

inactivity.description: Leave the voice channel after this many seconds of inactivity.

clearQueue.description: Clears the queue this many seconds after leaving the voice channel.

stopMessageListeners.description:
Stops responding to button presses and other interactions on sent messages after this many seconds.
Setting to 0 may have unexpected behaviour.
